about.paragraph1: Hello! I'm Hassan, a dedicated developer with a knack for building elegant and efficient solutions. My journey in tech started with a simple "Hello, World!" and has since evolved into a passion for crafting complete web experiences, from the server logic to the pixel-perfect frontend.
about.paragraph2: I thrive in collaborative environments and am also eager to learn new technologies to stay at the forefront of web development. When I'm not coding, I enjoy exploring new coffee shops and contributing to open-source projects.
